plugin-data.name: Atom RSS
plugin-data.description: Adds Atom and RSS feeds to your website.

feed-item-limit-tip:
Maximum number of items in Atom and RSS feeds.
Default: "10". "-1" will output ALL pages.
feed-url-atom-tip: URL that people use to subscribe to your Atom feed.
feed-url-rss-tip: URL that people use to subscribe to your RSS feed.
